events.comment:
The example is using the Web Speech API and Javascript event to call the API that is built in to all modern browsers. Any text we assign to the speech variable is going to be used by the script to generate the voice using the API.
At the beginning we set the value of speech to what you see and then call the script which is going to generate the voice using the text

We are using the text entry object to input more text for the API
If the enter key is pressed, we get the text from the text entry object and assign it to the speech variable then we call the script
Update the text object to display what is entered in to the text entry object
